title: Fine & Raw Hazelnut Butter Spread 8 Ounce – Clean Ingredients, Vegan, and Organic Hazelnut Spread (Crunchy Chocolate Hazelnut)
features: GET CRUNCHING - Stir up something SPECIAL with the newest addition to the FINE & RAW Spread fam. This Spread is all business on top and all party on the bottom. It adds just the right crunch (crushed hazelnuts) to sandwiches, recipes, dips, icings, and fillings.

STIR IT UP - We've basically created the best thing you could ever eat with a spoon. We use the world’s best cacao and the world’s best hazelnuts combine into a totally addictive crunchy spread. Stir this baby up and don't be afraid to eat straight out of the jar!
INGREDIENTS - Organic hazelnuts, organic coconut sugar, organic cacao bean, organic cacao powder, organic whole ground vanilla, sea salt.
YUM - Gluten Free. Kosher. Plant based/Vegan/Dairy-Free. Organic. Yum. Hazelnuts grown in Oregon, USA. Handmade is Brooklyn.
